group_1.textCenter: Now we can really get things going.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yahoooooo!

group_1.textRight: H-how did you guys know it's my birthday?

group_1.textLeft: I got a call from your parents the day@before we left on our trip.

group_1.narration: "Iroha's birthday is on August 22nd.@We're planning to send her some presents..."
"Yes, um, we're really sorry to ask you to@do this, but someone needs to receive them."
"And we accidentally scheduled the delivery@for August 23rd."
"So, it would be wonderful if you could@be there to accept them on the 23rd."

group_1.textLeft: That's how we found out.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, what's with that?! Aren't we your@friends?
You gotta let us know these things loud and@clear!

group_1.textLeft: People don't normally yell their birthday@from the rooftops.

group_1.textRight: Eh?! But I know I'D do it! [chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100301:cheek_1][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_100][chara:100301:lipSynch_1]I'd be all,@"Let's partyyy!"

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, Yachiyo told us about it in secret.
So we planned this!
Okay, so...I'll bring out the cake!
I reserved one before we left for the beach,@and we just picked it up earlier.
But before we eat...
This is for you. It's a birthday present.
Go on, open it.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh my gosh! This is the cookbook I wanted!

group_1.textLeft: We were all scratching our heads about it.
Even during the trip, we were still working@out what to get you.
But then we won that book voucher, and it@reminded me of the cookbook you wanted.
It just happened to jog my memory is all.
Thank you for the food...
Haaaaaah!

group_1.textRight: The one you got from the food battle!

group_1.textLeft: I have a present for you, too... Um, here!
It's, uh, well...a picture of Goingon!
Going-gone! Hey, hey!@Going-gone! Hey, hey!
I reimagined it as a kind of cute animal.
The idea came to my head during the trip@and I sketched it out!
I put it in a frame, too!
It's also a kind of homage to@Mr. Purrs-a-lot!
I'd love to explain it all in detail later!
Here's my present!
Check it out! It's a photo album of our@time at the festival!

group_1.textRight: Wooow! [chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_1][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1][chara:100101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]These are all the pictures you@took!
Iroha! Let me snap a photo real quick!

group_1.textLeft: Ack! Uh, okay!
I went to get 'em printed out right away,@and then I put them all in an album!
Tsuruno
Print some of them out for me too.
Me too, please!

group_1.textRight: Guess I gotta print 'em for everyone!

group_1.textLeft: Thanks in advance.
Now, the next one is from Felicia, right?
Yup! Here ya go!
It's a special Iroha brooch!
I bought craft stuff and paper-mache,@and I drew a picture of your face!
Then I carved it out...
...usin' the tricks I learned from cookie@carving!
[chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
Oh my! Our amazing goddess sure is fast!@She's snipping through them at high speed!
Then I colored it all in...
And I stuck it onto a clasp, so you can@use it like a brooch.
[chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah, Yachiyo helped me... Heh heh.

group_1.textRight: Thank you... *Giggle* It looks just like@me!

group_1.textLeft: I know, doesn't it?!

group_1.textRight: Thank you so, so, so, so so SOOO@much!

group_1.textLeft: Hang on just a moment. There's still one@more thing.
It's not something from us.
I thought they'd be here by now. Has anyone@checked the door?
Wait, so...
Looks like they just got here.
Birthdaaay!
You made it right on time. We just gave@her our presents.

group_1.textRight: Oh, then now's the time to give ours!
Anyway, yeah! Here's a little somethin'@from us!

group_1.textLeft: Ohhh, you didn't have to do that!

group_1.textRight: We each tried comin' up with our own gifts,@but we couldn't think of anythin'...
So we pooled our money together and bought@you some flowers!
Konomi did the arranging for us. The bouquet@turned out so pretty!

group_1.textLeft: For me?! Ahhh!@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_1][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Thank you!

group_1.textRight: We bought some stuff to eat, too.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, but Rena only got the stuff she@likes.
Thank you so much, everyone!
I... I just...
*Sniffle* *Sniffle* *Sob*

group_1.textRight: Hey, now, don't cry! There, there.

group_1.textLeft: Now we can really start the party.
[chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Time to EAT!

group_1.textCenter: Yes, they told me. Thank you so much!
Hm? Am I lonely being by myself on my@birthday?

group_1.textRight: Wah! Rena started eating the snacks already!

group_1.textLeft: *Munch* So what? *Chew*
Meanie! No fair!
Settle down. I'll put out plates.
I'm going to put the cake here!

group_1.textCenter: *Giggle* Actually, no. I'm not lonely@at all.

group_1.narration: — Iroha —@I'm actually having...the best@birthday ever right now!
